044import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.shaded.protobuf.generated.AdminProtos;
045import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.shaded.protobuf.generated.AdminProtos.CloseRegionResponse;
046import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.shaded.protobuf.generated.AdminProtos.GetOnlineRegionResponse;
047import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.shaded.protobuf.generated.AdminProtos.GetServerInfoResponse;
048import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.shaded.protobuf.generated.AdminProtos.ServerInfo;

064import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.shaded.protobuf.generated.RegionServerStatusProtos.GetLastFlushedSequenceIdResponse;

066/**
067 * Helper utility to build protocol buffer responses, or retrieve data from protocol buffer
068 * responses.
069 */
070@InterfaceAudience.Private
071public final class ResponseConverter {
072  private static final Logger LOG = LoggerFactory.getLogger(ResponseConverter.class);
073
074  private ResponseConverter() {
075  }
076
077  // Start utilities for Client
078  public static SingleResponse getResult(final ClientProtos.MutateRequest request,
079    final ClientProtos.MutateResponse response, final CellScanner cells) throws IOException {
080    SingleResponse singleResponse = new SingleResponse();
081    SingleResponse.Entry entry = new SingleResponse.Entry();
082    entry.setResult(ProtobufUtil.toResult(response.getResult(), cells));
083    entry.setProcessed(response.getProcessed());
084    singleResponse.setEntry(entry);
085    return singleResponse;
086  }
087
088  /**
089   * Get the results from a protocol buffer MultiResponse
090   * @param request  the original protocol buffer MultiRequest
091   * @param response the protocol buffer MultiResponse to convert
092   * @param cells    Cells to go with the passed in <code>proto</code>. Can be null.
093   * @return the results that were in the MultiResponse (a Result or an Exception).
094   */
095  public static org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.MultiResponse getResults(final MultiRequest request,
096    final MultiResponse response, final CellScanner cells) throws IOException {
097    return getResults(request, null, response, cells);
098  }
099
100  /**
101   * Get the results from a protocol buffer MultiResponse
102   * @param request  the original protocol buffer MultiRequest
103   * @param indexMap Used to support RowMutations/CheckAndMutate in batch
104   * @param response the protocol buffer MultiResponse to convert
105   * @param cells    Cells to go with the passed in <code>proto</code>. Can be null.
106   * @return the results that were in the MultiResponse (a Result or an Exception).
107   */
108  public static org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.MultiResponse getResults(final MultiRequest request,
109    final Map<Integer, Integer> indexMap, final MultiResponse response, final CellScanner cells)
110    throws IOException {
111    int requestRegionActionCount = request.getRegionActionCount();
112    int responseRegionActionResultCount = response.getRegionActionResultCount();
113    if (requestRegionActionCount != responseRegionActionResultCount) {
114      throw new IllegalStateException("Request mutation count=" + requestRegionActionCount
115        + " does not match response mutation result count=" + responseRegionActionResultCount);
116    }
117
118    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.MultiResponse results =
119      new org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.MultiResponse();
120
121    for (int i = 0; i < responseRegionActionResultCount; i++) {
122      RegionAction actions = request.getRegionAction(i);
123      RegionActionResult actionResult = response.getRegionActionResult(i);
124      HBaseProtos.RegionSpecifier rs = actions.getRegion();
125      if (
126        rs.hasType()
127          && (rs.getType() != HBaseProtos.RegionSpecifier.RegionSpecifierType.REGION_NAME)
128      ) {
129        throw new IllegalArgumentException(
130          "We support only encoded types for protobuf multi response.");
131      }
132      byte[] regionName = rs.getValue().toByteArray();
133
134      if (actionResult.hasException()) {
135        Throwable regionException = ProtobufUtil.toException(actionResult.getException());
136        results.addException(regionName, regionException);
137        continue;
138      }
139
140      if (actions.getActionCount() != actionResult.getResultOrExceptionCount()) {
141        throw new IllegalStateException("actions.getActionCount=" + actions.getActionCount()
142          + ", actionResult.getResultOrExceptionCount=" + actionResult.getResultOrExceptionCount()
143          + " for region " + actions.getRegion());
144      }
145
146      // For RowMutations/CheckAndMutate action, if there is an exception, the exception is set
147      // at the RegionActionResult level and the ResultOrException is null at the original index
148      Integer index = (indexMap == null ? null : indexMap.get(i));
149      if (index != null) {
150        // This RegionAction is from a RowMutations/CheckAndMutate in a batch.
151        // If there is an exception from the server, the exception is set at
152        // the RegionActionResult level, which has been handled above.
153        if (actions.hasCondition()) {
154          results.add(regionName, index, getCheckAndMutateResult(actionResult, cells));
155        } else {
156          results.add(regionName, index, getMutateRowResult(actionResult, cells));
157        }
158        continue;
159      }
160
161      if (actions.hasCondition()) {
162        results.add(regionName, 0, getCheckAndMutateResult(actionResult, cells));
163      } else {
164        if (actionResult.hasProcessed()) {
165          results.add(regionName, 0, getMutateRowResult(actionResult, cells));
166          continue;
167        }
168        for (ResultOrException roe : actionResult.getResultOrExceptionList()) {
169          Object responseValue;
170          if (roe.hasException()) {
171            responseValue = ProtobufUtil.toException(roe.getException());
172          } else if (roe.hasResult()) {
173            responseValue = ProtobufUtil.toResult(roe.getResult(), cells);
174          } else if (roe.hasServiceResult()) {
175            responseValue = roe.getServiceResult();
176          } else {
177            responseValue = ProtobufUtil.EMPTY_RESULT_EXISTS_TRUE;
178          }
179          results.add(regionName, roe.getIndex(), responseValue);
180        }
181      }
182    }
183
184    if (response.hasRegionStatistics()) {
185      ClientProtos.MultiRegionLoadStats stats = response.getRegionStatistics();
186      for (int i = 0; i < stats.getRegionCount(); i++) {
187        results.addStatistic(stats.getRegion(i).getValue().toByteArray(), stats.getStat(i));
188      }
189    }
190
191    return results;
192  }
193
194  private static CheckAndMutateResult getCheckAndMutateResult(RegionActionResult actionResult,
195    CellScanner cells) throws IOException {
196    Result result = null;
197    if (actionResult.getResultOrExceptionCount() > 0) {
198      // Get the result of the Increment/Append operations from the first element of the
199      // ResultOrException list
200      ResultOrException roe = actionResult.getResultOrException(0);
201      if (roe.hasResult()) {
202        Result r = ProtobufUtil.toResult(roe.getResult(), cells);
203        if (!r.isEmpty()) {
204          result = r;
205        }
206      }
207    }
208    return new CheckAndMutateResult(actionResult.getProcessed(), result);
209  }
210
211  private static Result getMutateRowResult(RegionActionResult actionResult, CellScanner cells)
212    throws IOException {
213    if (actionResult.getProcessed()) {
214      Result result = null;
215      if (actionResult.getResultOrExceptionCount() > 0) {
216        // Get the result of the Increment/Append operations from the first element of the
217        // ResultOrException list
218        ResultOrException roe = actionResult.getResultOrException(0);
219        Result r = ProtobufUtil.toResult(roe.getResult(), cells);
220        if (!r.isEmpty()) {
221          r.setExists(true);
222          result = r;
223        }
224      }
225      if (result != null) {
226        return result;
227      } else {
228        return ProtobufUtil.EMPTY_RESULT_EXISTS_TRUE;
229      }
230    } else {
231      return ProtobufUtil.EMPTY_RESULT_EXISTS_FALSE;
232    }
233  }
234
235  /**
236   * Create a CheckAndMutateResult object from a protocol buffer MutateResponse
237   * @return a CheckAndMutateResult object
238   */
239  public static CheckAndMutateResult getCheckAndMutateResult(
240    ClientProtos.MutateResponse mutateResponse, CellScanner cells) throws IOException {
241    boolean success = mutateResponse.getProcessed();
242    Result result = null;
243    if (mutateResponse.hasResult()) {
244      result = ProtobufUtil.toResult(mutateResponse.getResult(), cells);
245    }
246    return new CheckAndMutateResult(success, result);
247  }
248
249  /**
250   * Wrap a throwable to an action result.
251   * @return an action result builder
252   */
253  public static ResultOrException.Builder buildActionResult(final Throwable t) {
254    ResultOrException.Builder builder = ResultOrException.newBuilder();
255    if (t != null) builder.setException(buildException(t));
256    return builder;
257  }
258
259  /**
260   * Wrap a throwable to an action result.
261   * @return an action result builder
262   */
263  public static ResultOrException.Builder buildActionResult(final ClientProtos.Result r) {
264    ResultOrException.Builder builder = ResultOrException.newBuilder();
265    if (r != null) builder.setResult(r);
266    return builder;
267  }
268
269  /** Returns NameValuePair of the exception name to stringified version os exception. */
270  public static NameBytesPair buildException(final Throwable t) {
271    NameBytesPair.Builder parameterBuilder = NameBytesPair.newBuilder();
272    parameterBuilder.setName(t.getClass().getName());
273    parameterBuilder.setValue(ByteString.copyFromUtf8(StringUtils.stringifyException(t)));
274    return parameterBuilder.build();
275  }
276
277  /**
278   * Builds a protocol buffer HasPermissionResponse
279   */
280  public static HasPermissionResponse buildHasPermissionResponse(boolean hasPermission) {
281    HasPermissionResponse.Builder builder = HasPermissionResponse.newBuilder();
282    builder.setHasPermission(hasPermission);
283    return builder.build();
284  }
285
286  // End utilities for Client
287  // Start utilities for Admin
288
289  /**
290   * Get the list of region info from a GetOnlineRegionResponse
291   * @param proto the GetOnlineRegionResponse
292   * @return the list of region info
293   */
294  public static List<RegionInfo> getRegionInfos(final GetOnlineRegionResponse proto) {
295    if (proto == null || proto.getRegionInfoCount() == 0) return null;
296    return ProtobufUtil.getRegionInfos(proto);
297  }
298
299  /**
300   * Check if the region is closed from a CloseRegionResponse
301   * @param proto the CloseRegionResponse
302   * @return the region close state
303   */
304  public static boolean isClosed(final CloseRegionResponse proto) {
305    if (proto == null || !proto.hasClosed()) return false;
306    return proto.getClosed();
307  }
308
309  /**
310   * A utility to build a GetServerInfoResponse.
311   * @return the response
312   */
313  public static GetServerInfoResponse buildGetServerInfoResponse(final ServerName serverName,
314    final int webuiPort) {
315    GetServerInfoResponse.Builder builder = GetServerInfoResponse.newBuilder();
316    ServerInfo.Builder serverInfoBuilder = ServerInfo.newBuilder();
317    serverInfoBuilder.setServerName(ProtobufUtil.toServerName(serverName));
318    if (webuiPort >= 0) {
319      serverInfoBuilder.setWebuiPort(webuiPort);
320    }
321    builder.setServerInfo(serverInfoBuilder.build());
322    return builder.build();
323  }
324
325  /**
326   * A utility to build a GetOnlineRegionResponse.
327   * @return the response
328   */
329  public static GetOnlineRegionResponse
330    buildGetOnlineRegionResponse(final List<RegionInfo> regions) {
331    GetOnlineRegionResponse.Builder builder = GetOnlineRegionResponse.newBuilder();
332    for (RegionInfo region : regions) {
333      builder.addRegionInfo(ProtobufUtil.toRegionInfo(region));
334    }
335    return builder.build();
336  }
337
338  /**
339   * Creates a response for the catalog scan request
340   * @return A RunCatalogScanResponse
341   */
342  public static RunCatalogScanResponse buildRunCatalogScanResponse(int numCleaned) {
343    return RunCatalogScanResponse.newBuilder().setScanResult(numCleaned).build();
344  }
345
346  /**
347   * Creates a response for the catalog scan request
348   * @return A EnableCatalogJanitorResponse
349   */
350  public static EnableCatalogJanitorResponse buildEnableCatalogJanitorResponse(boolean prevValue) {
351    return EnableCatalogJanitorResponse.newBuilder().setPrevValue(prevValue).build();
352  }
353
354  /**
355   * Creates a response for the cleaner chore request
356   * @return A RunCleanerChoreResponse
357   */
358  public static RunCleanerChoreResponse buildRunCleanerChoreResponse(boolean ran) {
359    return RunCleanerChoreResponse.newBuilder().setCleanerChoreRan(ran).build();
360  }
361
362  // End utilities for Admin
363
364  /**
365   * Creates a response for the last flushed sequence Id request
366   * @return A GetLastFlushedSequenceIdResponse
367   */
368  public static GetLastFlushedSequenceIdResponse
369    buildGetLastFlushedSequenceIdResponse(RegionStoreSequenceIds ids) {
370    return GetLastFlushedSequenceIdResponse.newBuilder()
371      .setLastFlushedSequenceId(ids.getLastFlushedSequenceId())
372      .addAllStoreLastFlushedSequenceId(ids.getStoreSequenceIdList()).build();
373  }
374
375  /**
376   * Stores an exception encountered during RPC invocation so it can be passed back through to the
377   * client.
378   * @param controller the controller instance provided by the client when calling the service
379   * @param ioe        the exception encountered
380   */
381  public static void setControllerException(RpcController controller, IOException ioe) {
382    if (controller != null) {
383      if (controller instanceof ServerRpcController) {
384        ((ServerRpcController) controller).setFailedOn(ioe);
385      } else {
386        controller.setFailed(StringUtils.stringifyException(ioe));
387      }
388    }
389  }
390
391  /**
392   * Retreivies exception stored during RPC invocation.
393   * @param controller the controller instance provided by the client when calling the service
394   * @return exception if any, or null; Will return DoNotRetryIOException for string represented
395   *         failure causes in controller.
396   */
397  @Nullable
398  public static IOException getControllerException(RpcController controller) throws IOException {
399    if (controller != null && controller.failed()) {
400      if (controller instanceof ServerRpcController) {
401        return ((ServerRpcController) controller).getFailedOn();
402      } else {
403        return new DoNotRetryIOException(controller.errorText());
404      }
405    }
406    return null;
407  }
408
409  /**
410   * Create Results from the cells using the cells meta data.
411   */
412  public static Result[] getResults(CellScanner cellScanner, ScanResponse response)
413    throws IOException {
414    if (response == null) return null;
415    // If cellscanner, then the number of Results to return is the count of elements in the
416    // cellsPerResult list. Otherwise, it is how many results are embedded inside the response.
417    int noOfResults =
418      cellScanner != null ? response.getCellsPerResultCount() : response.getResultsCount();
419    Result[] results = new Result[noOfResults];
420    for (int i = 0; i < noOfResults; i++) {
421      if (cellScanner != null) {
422        // Cells are out in cellblocks. Group them up again as Results. How many to read at a
423        // time will be found in getCellsLength -- length here is how many Cells in the i'th Result
424        int noOfCells = response.getCellsPerResult(i);
425        boolean isPartial =
426          response.getPartialFlagPerResultCount() > i ? response.getPartialFlagPerResult(i) : false;
427        List<Cell> cells = new ArrayList<>(noOfCells);
428        for (int j = 0; j < noOfCells; j++) {
429          try {
430            if (cellScanner.advance() == false) {
431              // We are not able to retrieve the exact number of cells which ResultCellMeta says us.
432              // We have to scan for the same results again. Throwing DNRIOE as a client retry on
433              // the
434              // same scanner will result in OutOfOrderScannerNextException
435              String msg = "Results sent from server=" + noOfResults + ". But only got " + i
436                + " results completely at client. Resetting the scanner to scan again.";
437              LOG.error(msg);
438              throw new DoNotRetryIOException(msg);
439            }
440          } catch (IOException ioe) {
441            // We are getting IOE while retrieving the cells for Results.
442            // We have to scan for the same results again. Throwing DNRIOE as a client retry on the
443            // same scanner will result in OutOfOrderScannerNextException
444            LOG.error(
445              "Exception while reading cells from result." + "Resetting the scanner to scan again.",
446              ioe);
447            throw new DoNotRetryIOException("Resetting the scanner.", ioe);
448          }
449          cells.add(cellScanner.current());
450        }
451        results[i] = Result.create(cells, null, response.getStale(), isPartial);
452      } else {
453        // Result is pure pb.
454        results[i] = ProtobufUtil.toResult(response.getResults(i));
455      }
456    }
457    return results;
458  }
459
460  public static Map<String, Long> getScanMetrics(ScanResponse response) {
461    Map<String, Long> metricMap = new HashMap<>();
462    if (response == null || !response.hasScanMetrics()) {
463      return metricMap;
464    }
465
466    ScanMetrics metrics = response.getScanMetrics();
467    int numberOfMetrics = metrics.getMetricsCount();
468    for (int i = 0; i < numberOfMetrics; i++) {
469      NameInt64Pair metricPair = metrics.getMetrics(i);
470      if (metricPair != null) {
471        String name = metricPair.getName();
472        Long value = metricPair.getValue();
473        if (name != null && value != null) {
474          metricMap.put(name, value);
475        }
476      }
477    }
478
479    return metricMap;
480  }
481
482  /**
483   * Creates a protocol buffer ClearRegionBlockCacheResponse
484   * @return a ClearRegionBlockCacheResponse
485   */
486  public static AdminProtos.ClearRegionBlockCacheResponse
487    buildClearRegionBlockCacheResponse(final HBaseProtos.CacheEvictionStats cacheEvictionStats) {
488    return AdminProtos.ClearRegionBlockCacheResponse.newBuilder().setStats(cacheEvictionStats)
489      .build();
490  }
491}
